name: Spacecoast
description:
Is currently a prototype and inspired by the F-Zero physic system. If you have any ideas, wishes etc. let me know!

 Contact and more updates on my Twitter.

Installation
  • Download and extract the .zip file
  • open Spacecoast.exeto play
Controls
  • W / Right Trigger - Accelerate
  • S / Left Trigger - Break
  • A, D / Left Stick - Move left and right
  • Space / A Button - Boost
  • R - Reset Game
  • X - Quit Game
